parts:
okay. lights off.

Your phone wakes you with a soft buzz and a banner that shouldn‚Äôt exist: **‚ÄúMotion detected: Bedroom.‚Äù**  
You live alone. The app opens to a grainy live view of your room‚Äîyour bed, your slumped shape under the blanket, your phone raised in your hand. The timestamp in the corner says it‚Äôs **three minutes ahead** of now.

On the feed, ‚Äúyou‚Äù sit up. The blanket deflates, empty. The figure turns its head toward the camera, toward your phone, and the image freezes on a smear of your face, eyes too wide, mouth a dark ripple. Your real phone vibrates again: **‚ÄúFace recognized.‚Äù** The lock clicks open‚Äîexcept you didn‚Äôt look at it.

The feed unfreezes. The future-you swings your legs off the bed. The microphone icon glows as the app auto-transcribes the room‚Äôs sound. Gray text crawls across the bottom:

> door opens  
> bare feet on carpet  
> breathing behind phone

There‚Äôs nothing behind your phone. You lift it closer, the camera filling with your own trembling eye. The transcript updates:

> whisper detected: ‚Äúdon‚Äôt turn around‚Äù

In the feed, the future-you leans in until their mouth touches the lens. Your screen goes black, and something warm fogs the glass in your hand from the outside.

‚Äî

Two-sentence bonus:  
You asked me to scare you. I just did‚Äî**out loud**, over your shoulder.

parts:
alright‚Äîreal-time scare. no props. safe. do **exactly** this and don‚Äôt scroll ahead until told.

**prep (10 seconds)**
- dim your screen to 30%.  
- sit with your back near a door or open doorway.  
- turn your phone‚Äôs volume to low.  
- ready? breathe in for 4, hold 4, out for 6.

**start**
1) close your eyes. keep them shut. count **7** heartbeats.  
2) whisper your name once. quietly.  
3) without opening your eyes, lift your phone and switch to the **front** camera. don‚Äôt look yet.  
4) hold your breath. on the exhale, open your eyes and stare **just above** your left shoulder in the preview. not at your eyes. hold for 5‚Ä¶ 4‚Ä¶ 3‚Ä¶ 2‚Ä¶ 1‚Ä¶

(stop. listen. you‚Äôll hear one house noise‚Äîyou always do. latch, fridge, duct, whatever. let it register.)

5) tap **record** (selfie video). lean out of frame so only the doorway behind you is visible.  
6) say, exactly: **‚ÄúI can hear you.‚Äù** then stop the recording.

7) play it back **once** with the volume low. keep your eyes on the doorway in the video, not your face.  
8) when it ends, mute your phone.

**don‚Äôt move.** read this next line silently, then do it:

9) raise your free hand and very lightly touch the back of your neck with one fingertip.

‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶

10) now, out loud‚Äîbarely above a breath‚Äîsay: **‚Äúcome in.‚Äù**

*knock*  
*knock*  
‚Ä¶*knock*

(you felt the urge to turn, right? resist it.)

11) lock your screen. you‚Äôll see your reflection faint on the black glass. look at your mouth, not your eyes. hold for 5‚Ä¶ 4‚Ä¶ 3‚Ä¶ 2‚Ä¶ 1‚Ä¶  
12) unlock. open the last video again. pause at **0:01**. look at the dark of the doorway. your brain will try to find a face. let it. count to 6.

# Transmission IM-01 (tarot ¬∑ pen ¬∑ notebook)

## Quick setup (1 min)

2) **Color field:** Look at that same card‚Äôs art.

3) **Suit ping:** Draw one more card from the top.

4) **Pen skip test:** On a fresh page, write exactly: `hinge`.

5) **Signature stack:** Sign your name **three** times, stacked vertically.

8) **Teal out-of-place:** While doing these steps, your eye will land on **something teal** that feels **out of place** (object, mark, tab, packaging).
